function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of inclusive communication channels and languages for vulnerable populations","Impact":"Misinformation and lack of understanding leading to increased risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Use diverse channels, simple language, and sign language to communicate information","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile apps, internet access","People":"Vulnerable populations","Owner":"News broadcasts, healthcare systems, non-governmental organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of access to mental health services and support for vulnerable populations","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health issues and limited access to care","Mitigation":"Use of telemedicine, mobile apps, and training for healthcare professionals in psychosocial skills","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile apps, training programs","People":"Vulnerable populations, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare systems, non-governmental organizations"}]}
